attributes.title: Mount Olympus Bottled Water
attributes.description:
Created on November 13, 2010 by VictoriaEdwards on Sourcemap.org:

Based in Salt Lake City, Utah, Mount Olympus Waters Inc. bottles water from the Mount Olympus Spring.  It is bottled at a plant in Salt Lake City and then taken to smaller distribution offices across Utah and Idaho for delivery.
